entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is mentioned as a person who grew up in an orphanage and was obsessed with his parentage. He searched for his father's name on various records and books.

entities.name: tom riddle senior
entities.description: Tom Riddle Senior is mentioned as the father of Riddle, who never set foot in Hogwarts.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as the assumed identity of Riddle after he dropped his previous name.

entities.name: marvolo
entities.description: Marvolo is mentioned as a family name that Riddle used to investigate his mother's family.
